ai-kv22.2:1.1_0: with a perfected one, with mind free of defilements as they become extinguished?
ai-kv22.2:1.5_0: does a legal procedure against the place where the majority is done.
ai-kv22.2:1.6_0: does a legal procedure to be done by an incomplete assembly ...
ai-kv22.2:1.7_0: does a legal procedure with authority ...
ai-kv22.2:1.8_0: did a legal procedure to be done by a unanimous assembly,
ai-kv22.2:1.10_0: doing the legal procedure with a large following ...
ai-kv22.2:1.11_0: did the procedure of the gods.
ai-kv22.2:1.12_0: doing what was required by human beings, that they become fully extinguished?
ai-kv22.2:2.1_0: with a perfected one, with mind free of defilements as they become extinguished?
ai-kv22.2:2.3_0: Doing so, they give up mixtures, while discarding them, but remain after discarding them.
ai-kv22.2:2.5_0: but remain after getting rid of them?
ai-kv22.2:2.7_0: If he neither get rid of nor accumulates them, but remain after getting rid of them.
ai-kv22.2:2.9_0: neither give nor grasp, but remain after giving them up.
ai-kv22.2:2.10_0: Though they neither dissipate nor get clouded by, but remain after dissipating them?
ai-kv22.2:2.12_0: And they neither dissipate nor get clouded by, but remain after dissipating them.
ai-kv22.2:3.1_0: should not correct them like this:
ai-kv22.2:3.2_0: “Are their mind free from the skillful?”
ai-kv22.2:3.6_0: And they’re perfected and fully extinguished on that account.
ai-kv22.2:3.8_0: The account of the skillful behaviors is finished.
